executable.title: DICOM Measurements reporting
executable.description: This tool can be used to save measurements calculated from the image over a volume defined by image segmentation into a DICOM Structured Report that follows [template TID1500](http://dicom.nema.org/medical/dicom/current/output/chtml/part16/chapter_A.html#sect_TID_1500).
executable.acknowledgements: This work is supported in part the National Institutes of Health, National Cancer Institute, Informatics Technology for Cancer Research (ITCR) program, grant Quantitative Image Informatics for Cancer Research (QIICR) (U24 CA180918, PIs Kikinis and Fedorov).

file.name: metaDataFileName
file.label: JSON metadata file
file.description: JSON file that contains the list of measurements and other meta data items that can be specified by the user. See documentation for details.

file.name: outputFileName
file.label: Output DICOM SR file name
file.description: File name of the DICOM SR object that will store the result of the conversion.

file.name: compositeContextDataDir
file.label: Composite context DICOM data dir
file.description: Location of input DICOM Data to be used for populating composite context. See documentation.

file.name: imageLibraryDataDir
file.label: Image library DICOM data dir
file.description: Location of input DICOM Data to be used for populating image library. See documentation.
